# R 

Go to [this website](https://cran.r-project.org/mirrors.html), and choose your country. If your country does not appear, choose the **0-Cloud** option - "https://cloud.r-project.org/".

On the next page choose the compatible operating system, and then choose **"install R for the first time."** which appears in the first line.

Choose **"Download R 4.0.4 for Windows"** (or other) and install the program.

# RStudio

Go to [this website](https://rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download), choose your preferred operating system and the most basic (and free) version of Rstudio, and install the program.

# If you use Windows operating system you should also install the rtools40
## 1) Download the program

Go to [this website](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/).

## 2) Install the program

Choose the **"rtools40-x86_64.exe"** or the **"rtools40-i686.exe"**

## 3) Finish installation

Follow the instructions under the title **"Putting Rtools on the PATH"** [here](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/).
